casebody.data:
Third Department,

Mat, 1950.

(May 3, 1950.) In the Matter of the Claim of Bernard Gawrys, Respondent, against Buffalo Bolt Company, Appellant, and American Motorists Insurance Company, Respondent. Workmen’s Compensation Board, Respondent.

Motion for reargument denied. Motion for leave to appeal to Court of Appeals denied, without costs. Present — Poster, P. J., Brewster, Deyo, Bergan and Coon, JJ. [See 276 App. Div. 1035.]
